root.app:title: Logology
root.sr:book-cover: Book Cover for Mastering PhoneGap Mobile Application Development

root.about:p:1: Logology was created as a demonstration intended to illustrate how to create mobile hybrid applications using Cordova / PhoneGap. If you're online, you can learn more by visiting the publisher's page for the book below.
root.about:p:2: Logology is an app about the love of words. Combinations of words are our thoughts, crystalized, ready to be put into action. Without definitions, our thoughts would be but ethereal dust to be blown away by the wind.
root.about:p:3: This app relies upon the following technologies. If online, you can tap each one for additional information.
root.search:enter: Use the search bar to look for words.
root.search:no-results: There are no results for your search term.
root.search:too-many-results: There are more results than can be displayed. Restrict your search. You can control how many results are displayed in the app's settings.
root.actions:favorite:title: Save this word as a favorite
root.actions:unfavorite:title: Forget this word as a favorite
root.actions:share:title: Share this word with others
root.actions:note:title: Create or edit a note for this word
root.actions:delete-note:title: Tap to delete this note
root.setting:font-family-desc: Select a comfortable typeface for reading.
root.setting:font-size-desc: Size of text for the entire app
root.setting:page-size-desc: The maximum number of words returned for any search. More results may result in slower response.
root.setting:reduce-motion-desc: If animations between views affects you negatively, you can disable most of them.
